Params: {3: 'Next to Chrome, Kamui is there grinning as always. Chaofeng is barely able to stand straight. Nobody says a word, but Chrome can tell that they have both entered the same dream just now.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Great. All three of you are okay.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Murray', 3: "To put it simply, you, the enemy, and Gray Raven have all stepped into a trap when entering the main control room, and you're now all trapped in the M.I.N.D. of the computing system, Huaxu.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'So if this is the virtual M.I.N.D. of the system... what was that we saw?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Likely a facade Huaxu created. Good thing I have experience dealing with things like this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Were you the one who opened the exit just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Yeah. Didn't expect you guys to find it yourselves, though. I was about to link myself over...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'I was surprised that you all managed to escape, too.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "That's not Lady Qu... That's Huaxu. The system controlling the ship.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The AI looks exactly like your leader?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Probably took on her form. This is Huaxu's M.I.N.D. after all, it can't be that hard.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: "What you see here... is not my true form. It will only appear when I'm with the main administrator.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: '...Huaxu, why did you throw us into that dream just now? Were you hoping to control us just like you did the others?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: "I never asked to control anyone. I'm only a dream-making machine. You're searching for Gestalt, so all I did was show you Gestalt's power.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But Gestalt is not a dream maker, is it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Indeed. The real Gestalt is likely far more powerful. I am but a lesser duplicate. So...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Let us battle. Defeat me, and I will bring you where you need to go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '...Please. Free this ship. End the dream.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're making it sound like you weren't the one at fault...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Perhaps we've all got it wrong... What's controlling the ship and bringing about all this chaos is Lady Qu herself... and Huaxu is but a computing system.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "In that case, all we need to do is find a way out of here. There's no need to fight, Chrome.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Qu is fighting in another location in this M.I.N.D.—Fighting for me. I didn't want Qu to do this, but I cannot let Qu's wishes go unanswered.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'So... Strike Hawk. Guests from Babylonia. Allow me. Let me struggle. Let me fail.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "If we're fighting, then you'd better give it your all, Huaxu.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I don't fight with the unresolved. And I won't be losing to a bundle of code.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Struggle. Fight with all you've got. I'll do the same. Then I'll wipe you off the face of this world.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing what Chrome has to say, Huaxu heaves a deep sigh of relief and pulls a bladed weapon out of the void.'}
{3: 'Chrome also draws his scythe from his coat. The two settle into stances. Chaofeng and Kamui step back to allow them space.'}
